case.state: There you are, ~player~... And there's my bridesmaid, too!

Matthew... That name brings back some memories. I hope I can rely on you as much as I can rely in the Matthew I know.
Is your name really Florina? What are the chances?! My best friend is also named Florina. I hope the two of you can meet some day.

Your name is Serra? I know another girl with that name. Skinny with pink hair. She looks frail, but you'd be surprised. She's not everyone's cup of tea, but once you get to know her, she's really easy to love.

This place resembles the Caelin Castle. Yet, it is a bit fancier. I care not about such trivialities. I am much more at ease in the never ending oceans of green of my Sacaen Plains.

Believe it or not, this is the first time I step foot in a classroom. While I didn't have a formal education, I was taught everything I needed to know by my parents. I never had the desire of being a school girl. Mother Earth and Father Sky prepared me for life.

Oh, I see I got assigned to a table with only boys. If you are expecting a show from me, you either miscalculated your chances, or you aren't very smart. At the very least, 3 of you have to lose. Are you ready to see that?
Oh, I see I got assigned to a table with only girls. That's alright by me. I'm used to see girls without clothes.

Now that my hands are bare, I can hold hands with both of you at once!

The bond between Manni Katti and myself is unique. Even if you try, you won't be able to wield it.

Manni Katti and I are one.

I heard my friend Florina was seen around here. That does not sound like her. Have you met her? Skinny, purple hair, really shy around men and really afraid of bees?
I am sure you two would have made a the cutest non-verbal couple.
Everything’s going to be fine. As long as you’re with me, you’ll be safe.
